QueuePicks_nested.ManageEmbedDescription:
Here you can move or remove Pokemon.
In general, the list shown here is a copy of your real list and is only updated after clicking `Save` or `Save and enable`.
Since the `/queuepicks add` command adds the Pokemon directly to the real list, you must click `Load new Pokemon` here afterwards to update the list. Alternatively, you can open a new management window via `/queuepicks manage`.
QueuePicks_nested.ManagePokemonAlreadyAtTop: The Pokemon is already at the top!
QueuePicks_nested.ManagePokemonAlreadyAtBottom: The Pokemon is already at the bottom!
QueuePicks_nested.ManageFinishDisabled:
Your new queue pick order has been saved!
The system is currently **disabled** for you.
QueuePicks_nested.ManageFinishEnabled:
Your new queue pick order has been saved!
The system is currently **enabled** for you.
QueuePicks_nested.SnipeWarningEnabled:
`{pokemon}` from your queue was picked by {sniper}.
However, the system continues to run for you.
QueuePicks_nested.SnipeWarningDisabled:
`{pokemon}` from your queue was picked by {sniper}.
The system was disabled for you so you can replan.

You picked `{pokemon}`.

generic.WelcomeMessage:
Hello **{user:Mention}** and thank you for inviting me to your server **{guildname}**!
You probably want the results from Showdown replays to be sent to a channel on your server.
To configure me, you have the following options:

**1. Results should be sent to the same channel:**
Simply type `/replaychannel add` in the respective channel

**2. Results should be sent to a different channel:**
Send `/replaychannel add #results-channel` in the channel where the replays will be posted later (The #results-channel is, of course, the channel where the results will be sent later)

Once the channels have been set up, just send /replay with the replay link in a replay channel and I’ll take care of the rest.

If the results should be sent in ||spoiler tags||, run the command `/spoilertags` somewhere on the server. This then applies server-wide.

If you have further questions or problems, send a DM to {mytag} or join the support server; the link is in my profile :)
generic.CommandNotAvailable: This command is not available here!
generic.TooManyResults: Too many results, please specify your search!
generic.InvalidArgument: The argument `{arg}` could not be recognized!
generic.NoPermission: You are not authorized to execute this interaction!
generic.RoutineMaintenance: Routine maintenance is being performed; I should be reachable again in a few minutes.
